MS.S: Manage brightness and other monitor settings with DDC/CI and WMI.

2.1.0:_x000D__x000A_ Updated the errors to be more descriptive when failing to fetch monitors._x000D__x000A_2.0:_x000D__x000A_ Added an argument transformer and argument completer to the "Monitor" parameter for all commands._x000D__x000A_ This allows users to specify the monitors with the device name like: Set-MonitorBrightness -Monitor \\.\DISPLAY1 -Value 10_x000D__x000A_ Added position 0 to the Monitor parameter for all commands with that parameter._x000D__x000A_ Other positional parameters have been bumped up by 1 as needed._x000D__x000A_ Added position 0 to the DeviceName parameter for the Get-Monitor command._x000D__x000A_1.0.3:_x000D__x000A_ Fix index out of bounds error for Get-Monitor when an attached monitor is disabled._x000D__x000A_1.0.2:_x000D__x000A_ Remove ValidateRange attributes from the Value and ALSBrightness parameters of Set-MonitorBrightness._x000D__x000A_ Don't throw when scanning for VCP features, unless the monitor handle is closed._x000D__x000A_1.0.1:_x000D__x000A_ Add positions for various parameters._x000D__x000A_1.0:_x000D__x000A_ Initial release.
Manage brightness and other monitor settings with DDC/CI and WMI.

2.1.0:_x000D__x000A_ Updated the errors to be more descriptive when failing to fetch monitors._x000D__x000A_2.0:_x000D__x000A_ Added an argument transformer and argument completer to the "Monitor" parameter for all commands._x000D__x000A_ This allows users to specify the monitors with the device name like: Set-MonitorBrightness -Monitor \\.\DISPLAY1 -Value 10_x000D__x000A_ Added position 0 to the Monitor parameter for all commands with that parameter._x000D__x000A_ Other positional parameters have been bumped up by 1 as needed._x000D__x000A_ Added position 0 to the DeviceName parameter for the Get-Monitor command._x000D__x000A_1.0.3:_x000D__x000A_ Fix index out of bounds error for Get-Monitor when an attached monitor is disabled._x000D__x000A_1.0.2:_x000D__x000A_ Remove ValidateRange attributes from the Value and ALSBrightness parameters of Set-MonitorBrightness._x000D__x000A_ Don't throw when scanning for VCP features, unless the monitor handle is closed._x000D__x000A_1.0.1:_x000D__x000A_ Add positions for various parameters._x000D__x000A_1.0:_x000D__x000A_ Initial release.
